attention3.ptxt: This thermometer indicates the ambient temperature in back of front bumper. Under any one of the following listed conditions, however, even when the ambient temperature goes up, the thermometer display does not rise so as to correct the rise of the ambient temperature caused by the radiant heat of the engine. When the ambient temperature drops, the thermometer reading follows the change in the temperature.
Be sure to bear this in mind when diagnosing trouble.

item.ptxt: The vehicle speed is 30 km/h (18 mph) or lower.
The ignition switch is turned on again within 2 hours.

action.ptxt: Replace fuse and check for short circuit.
Repair as necessary.
Replace unit.
Check outside air temperature sensor referring to Outside Air Temperature Sensor Inspection (If Equipped) .
Check ECM for DTC referring to DTC Check:For Petrol Engine Model .
Repair as necessary.
Replace unit.
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.

ps.ptxt: Outside air temperature is –30 °C (–22 °F) or less

action.ptxt: Check outside air temperature sensor referring to Outside Air Temperature Sensor Inspection (If Equipped) .
Replace unit.
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.

ps.ptxt: Outside air temperature is 50 °C (122 °F) or more

action.ptxt: Check outside air temperature sensor referring to Outside Air Temperature Sensor Inspection (If Equipped) .
Replace unit.
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.

condition.ptxt: Display of thermometer does not change at “- - -°C”

action.ptxt: Check outside air temperature sensor referring to Outside Air Temperature Sensor Inspection (If Equipped) .

ps.ptxt: Outside air temperature sensor circuit is open or short

action.ptxt: Repair circuit.
Repair circuit.
Replace unit.
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.

condition.ptxt: Display of fuel consumption does not change at “- - - l / 100 km (km/l, MPG)”

ps.ptxt: Vehicle is not running (instantaneous fuel consumption mode)
Fuel consumption was reset (average fuel consumption mode, if equipped)

action.ptxt: Vehicle runs for a while.
Check ECM for DTC referring to DTC Check:For Petrol Engine Model or DTC Check:For Diesel Engine Model .
Repair circuit.
Check input and output signal of ECM.
Replace unit.
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.
